xml.name: Selection
xml.Try: Put the caret before any word. Press EditorNextWordWithSelection to move caret to the next word with selection.
Press EditorSelectWord to extend selection to the next code block.
Try increase your selection with EditorSelectWord until your file will be selected.
EditorUnSelectWord shrinks selection. Try to press it.
xml.Text: Awesome, press button to start next lesson or use learn.next.lesson.
